[color=transparent]  [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/rjaz79O.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Hack Forums Mobile Theme Progress[/color][/b]
As I am sure all of you are aware, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] strongly believes Hack Forums must support mobile platforms more effectively in order to survive. In his efforts to accomplish this, our administrator made a post on his thread [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5757685][b]HF Mobile Friendly[/b][/url] in Rules, Announcements, News, and Feedback showcasing the new mobile theme in an early state. Click the source link if you would like to see the images for yourself.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5757685&pid=56373096#pid56373096]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

      

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3176965][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v3/Soulmate.png[/img][/url][/align]

[/list]

[color=#cccccc][size=small][color=white][b]Awards[/b][/color][/size][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?uid=952566][color=white][b]Armada[/b][/color][/url] received the [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=87][b]Golden Clover[/b][/url][img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/gold-shamrock.png[/img] award from [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5767668&pid=56361556#pid56361556]this[/url] post.  
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?uid=2061024][b]Raymond Reddington[/b][/url] received the [b][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=13]Ninja[/url][/b] [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/ninja-white_24.png[/img] award.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1582798][b]Jesse Pinkman[/b][/url] received the [b][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=5]Drunk[/url][/b] [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/beer-stein_24.png[/img] award [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5767725]this[/url] thread.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=275104][b]ra1d[/b][/url] received the [b][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=1]Diamond[/url][/b] [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/3.jpg[/img] award.
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2292899][b]Divined[/b][/url] received the [b][url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=1]Diamond[/url][/b] [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/3.jpg[/img], [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=78][b]Green Apple[/b][/url] [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/greenapple.png[/img], and [url=https://hackforums.net/myawards.php?awid=11][b]Hustler[/b][/url] [img]https://hackforums.net/uploads/awards/billiards_24.png[/img] awards.
[/list]

      

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3725052][img]https://i.imgur.com/YqYzQcC.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5757685&pid=56373096#pid56373096][color=#FFFFFF]New HF Theme progress pictures[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient shows progress pictures of the newest HF theme in the works.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Member Feedback & Testimonials[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5767725][color=#FFFFFF]Half Decade later.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1582798][color=#0066FF][b]Jesse Pinkman[/b][/color][/url]

[/list]

[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5768154][color=#FFFFFF]Thread Options [GUIDE] Demystifying the Windows Registry - A Comprehensive Guide[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=70909][color=#FFFFFF][b]AsSaSs@iN[/b][/color][/url]
A guide that will take you through some of the fundamentals of the Windows Registry. 
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]

[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5766230][color=#FFFFFF][Pimp your HF Profile] Special characters & symbols[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3773001][color=#FFCC00][b]Duke Buccellati[/b][/color][/url]
A thread with a ton of different symbols you can use around your profile.
[/list]
